class.name: franka_example_controllers/GravityCompensationExampleController
class.description: The gravity compensation controller only sends zero torques so that the robot does gravity compensation

class.name: franka_example_controllers/JointImpedanceExampleController
class.description: The joint impedance example controller moves joint 4 and 5 in a very compliant periodic movement.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/MoveToStartExampleController
class.description: The move to start example controller moves the robot into default pose.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/JointVelocityExampleController
class.description: The joint velocity example controller moves the robot joints with specific velocities.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/ModelExampleController
class.description: The franka model example controller evaluates and prints the dynamic model of Franka Emika Robots.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/RuntimePositionController
class.description: The runtime position controller can move the robot to the desired pose in runtime.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/RuntimeImpedanceController
class.description: The runtime impedance controller can move the robot to the desired pose in runtime and also in impedance way.
